entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:19 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
